text: Tonnaah sheytoona korosuh Yallah maglab haanaah sinni yallitteh maglab haanam keenit kah bilqissennah, sheytoona korosuk maggo marah ken xayloh qidim keenit bilqisseh finqat ken Qiddaah ken diini keenit tobolloktamkeh, Yalli woh abaanam keenik faxe wannay abak manannon, kinnih immay usuk ken uma caalat yeexegeeh keenil mekleh, toysa Nabiyow usun diraabak ginnaasitaanam kee ken Sittah cab
